forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 48. Northeast wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. North wind around 7 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn stretches its golden fingers over Downtown San Francisco, the air remains cool, offering a gentle reminder of winter’s lingering embrace. The night gives way to a partly cloudy sky, soft and inviting, heralding a day that promises mostly sunny conditions. Expect the warmth of the sun to peak near the low sixties, though a playful wind from the north suggests a slight chill that may accompany the sun’s ascent. 

The marine layer has receded, its foggy tendrils only whispering around the edges of the city, allowing for better clarity as the day unfolds. It is the kind of weather that beckons one to draw breath deep into the fresh air, perhaps while taking a stroll along the Embarcadero or savoring a warm beverage at a favorite café. Dress in light layers to harness the day's warmth while remaining prepared for the cool breezes that may sweep through. With time on your hands and skies brightening, a morning spent wandering through the treasures of the Ferry Building or a cozy afternoon exploring the nooks and crannies of North Beach could turn this typical day into something unexpectedly delightful.
